verses.verse: Let <WG3049> a man <WG444> so <WG3779> account <WG3049> of us <WG2248>, as <WG5613> of the ministers <WG5257> of Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> stewards <WG3623> of the mysteries <WG3466> of God <WG2316>.
<WG3739> <WG1161> Moreover <WG3063> it is required <WG2212> in <WG1722> stewards <WG3623>, that <WG2443> a man <WG5100> be found <WG2147> faithful <WG4103>.

But <WG1161> with me <WG1698> it is <WG2076> a very small thing <WG1519> <WG1646> that <WG2443> I should be judged <WG350> of <WG5259> you <WG5216>, or <WG2228> of <WG5259> man's <WG442> judgment <WG2250>: yea <WG235>, I judge <WG350> not <WG3761> mine own self <WG1683>. judgment: Gr. day

For <WG1063> I know <WG4894> nothing <WG3762> by myself <WG1683>; yet <WG235> am I <WG1344> not <WG3756> hereby <WG1722> <WG5129> justified <WG1344>: but <WG1161> he that judgeth <WG350> me <WG3165> is <WG2076> the Lord <WG2962>. know: or, I am not conscious of any fault

Therefore <WG5620> judge <WG2919> nothing <WG3361> <WG5100> before <WG4253> the time <WG2540>, until <WG2193> <WG302> the Lord <WG2962> come <WG2064>, who <WG3739> both <WG2532> will bring to light <WG5461> the hidden things <WG2927> of darkness <WG4655>, and <WG2532> will make manifest <WG5319> the counsels <WG1012> of the hearts <WG2588>: and <WG2532> then <WG5119> shall every man <WG1538> have <WG1096> praise <WG1868> of <WG575> God <WG2316>.

And <WG1161> these things <WG5023>, brethren <WG80>, I have in a figure transferred <WG3345> to <WG1519> myself <WG1683> and <WG2532> to Apollos <WG625> for <WG1223> your sakes <WG5209>; that <WG2443> ye might learn <WG3129> in <WG1722> us <WG2254> not <WG3361> to think <WG5426> of men above <WG5228> that <WG2443> which <WG3739> is written <WG1125>, that no <WG3363> one <WG1520> of you be puffed up <WG5448> for <WG5228> one <WG1520> against <WG2596> another <WG2087>.

For <WG1063> who <WG5101> maketh <WG1252> thee <WG4571> to differ <WG1252> from another? and <WG1161> what <WG5101> hast thou <WG2192> that <WG3739> thou didst <WG2983> not <WG3756> receive <WG2983>? <WG1161> now if <WG1499> thou didst receive <WG2983> it, why <WG5101> dost thou glory <WG2744>, as <WG5613> if thou hadst <WG2983> not <WG3361> received <WG2983> it? maketh: Gr. distinguisheth thee

Now <WG2235> ye are <WG2075> full <WG2880>, now <WG2235> ye are rich <WG4147>, ye have reigned as kings <WG936> without <WG5565> us <WG2257>: and <WG2532> I would to God <WG3785> <WG1065> ye did reign <WG936>, that <WG2443> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> might reign with <WG4821> you <WG5213>.

For <WG1063> I think <WG1380> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> hath set forth <WG584> us <WG2248> the apostles <WG652> last <WG2078>, as <WG5613> it were appointed to death <WG1935>: for <WG3754> we are made <WG1096> a spectacle <WG2302> unto the world <WG2889>, and <WG2532> to angels <WG32>, and <WG2532> to men <WG444>. spectacle: Gr. theatre

We <WG2249> are fools <WG3474> for <WG1223> Christ's <WG5547> sake <WG1223>, but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are wise <WG5429> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>; we <WG2249> are weak <WG772>, but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are strong <WG2478>; ye <WG5210> are honourable <WG1741>, but <WG1161> we <WG2249> are despised <WG820>.

Even <WG891> unto this present <WG737> hour <WG5610> we <WG3983> both <WG2532> hunger <WG3983>, and <WG2532> thirst <WG1372>, and <WG2532> are naked <WG1130>, and <WG2532> are buffeted <WG2852>, and <WG2532> have no certain dwellingplace <WG790>;
And <WG2532> labour <WG2872>, working <WG2038> with our own <WG2398> hands <WG5495>: being reviled <WG3058>, we bless <WG2127>; being persecuted <WG1377>, we suffer it <WG430>:

Being defamed <WG987>, we intreat <WG3870>: we are made <WG1096> as <WG5613> the filth <WG4027> of the world <WG2889>, and are the offscouring <WG4067> of all things <WG3956> unto <WG2193> this day <WG737>.
I write <WG1125> not <WG3756> these things <WG5023> to shame <WG1788> you <WG5209>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> sons <WG5043> I warn <WG3560> you.

For <WG1063> though <WG1437> ye have <WG2192> ten thousand <WG3463> instructors <WG3807> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>, yet <WG235> have ye not <WG3756> many <WG4183> fathers <WG3962>: for <WG1063> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> I <WG1473> have begotten <WG1080> you <WG5209> through <WG1223> the gospel <WG2098>.
Wherefore <WG3767> I beseech <WG3870> you <WG5209>, be ye <WG1096> followers <WG3402> of me <WG3450>.

For <WG1223> this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> have I sent <WG3992> unto you <WG5213> Timotheus <WG5095>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> son <WG5043>, and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>, who <WG3739> shall bring <WG363> you <WG5209> into remembrance <WG363> of my <WG3450> ways <WG3598> which <WG3588> be in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>, as <WG2531> I teach <WG1321> every where <WG3837> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> church <WG1577>.
Now <WG1161> some <WG5100> are puffed up <WG5448>, as though <WG5613> I <WG3450> would <WG2064> not <WG3361> come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>.

But <WG1161> I will come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> shortly <WG5030>, if <WG1437> the Lord <WG2962> will <WG2309>, and <WG2532> will know <WG1097>, not <WG3756> the speech <WG3056> of them which are puffed up <WG5448>, but <WG235> the power <WG1411>.
For <WG1063> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is not <WG3756> in <WG1722> word <WG3056>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> power <WG1411>.

What <WG5101> will ye <WG2309>? shall I come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> with <WG1722> a rod <WG4464>, or <WG2228> in <WG1722> love <WG26>, and <WG5037> in the spirit <WG4151> of meekness <WG4236>?
